Player History
Earned first career win on 4/15/1987...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1987, off Zane Smith (ATL)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/5/1988 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $878,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $1,540,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
Injured on 7/9/1991 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 2 weeks...
